channel.title: Changing a server from port 5555 to 43594?
channel.description: Just need to know how to do it, thanks!

item.source: Changing a server from port 5555 to 43594?

item.title: Changing a server from port 5555 to 43594?
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

Open your pimpscape folder, in the 2nd to last row, theres a document named “server”, right next to “serverfile”, right click “server” and click “edit”, when its open click the tab “edit” right next to “file”, then click “find” and when the find pops up, type in 5555 and click “Search next” in the direction “down”, when it goes to it, it will be highlighted, change the 5555 to 43594, or any other port you want.
-lilt

Read full topic

item.title: Changing a server from port 5555 to 43594?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Find your file server.java (looks like a notepad with writing on it), and CTRL F for Port =, then change it to 43594.

item.title: Changing a server from port 5555 to 43594?
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:


First Open: Server.Java In Notepad =D
Then: CTRL + F and search for 43594/5555
Then change the numbers to the port you wish to use.

Then in MoparS Client Go File ==> New Port ==> 43594 =D Done
